models.name: A A
models.subject: Organised Studio Space
models.message: A complete mid level solution to your shooting needs. Amazing Day light, All the assortment of Studio lights and backdrops, plus anything small or big you need, is right there.. fully organised. The Studio owner can also help you doing the initial setup light, so you can just come and shoot.

models.name: Jesse Delauney
models.subject: Excellent studio!
models.message: My band booked Desk & Studio for a promo photo shoot and we could not be happier with the level of service we received (thanks Lyn), the lighting and other equipment on-hand, and the space itself! We'll be looking to come back again next time without a doubt.

models.name: Deanna Politis
models.subject: Perfect studio space
models.message: The photography studio was absolutely amazing!! It had everything we needed to bring our vision to life, and the team was incredibly helpful throughout the process!

answer.message: Thank you for your beautiful review!

models.name: Heidi Gavriloff
models.subject: Love this studio!
models.message: We have done 3 shoots already in this beautiful space. Lyn is always so kind and incredibly helpful. Love coming here!

models.name: Tanya Wilson
models.subject: My absolute favourite studio!
models.message: I love shooting at Desk and Studio. The space is incredible, the lighting is beautiful and Lyn is always so kind and so helpful. My favourite studio to shoot at and my clients (both corporate and portrait) all love it!

models.name: ellocofish
models.subject: Studio par excellence
models.message:
I’ve used Desk & Studio on numerous occasions, incredibly, each time was better than the last.
Lyn is both super helpful & knowledgable.
The space itself has an abundance of b/drop & lighting options as well as being bright, airy with a wonderful ambiance.
Highly recommend!

answer.message: Thank you so much!! We love having you in the studio :)

models.name: Eric Ung
models.subject: Production shoots
models.message: We've used Desk and studio for multiple shoots and it's always been a great experience. Lyn is so accomodating and the space is perfect for everything we need. It includes backdrops and any lighting equipment we need as well which is perfect. Will be back for the next shoot for sure :)

models.name: ALIBII
models.subject: Highly Recommend this studio
models.message: We had such a fun, smooth and enjoyable time at "Desk and Studio" today. A experience that can be daunting to some people being in front of a camera was made so comfortable and carefree in this space. We will definitely be back soon :)

models.name: Family Stories Photography
models.subject: First studio shooting and it was a blast!
models.message: Thank you Lyn for creating such a beautiful, cosy and warm space. The studio is lovely and all of the details are well thought off: the backgrounds, props, dressing room, you name it. Not to mention the extensive range of lighting equipment. I will definitely be coming back here :)

models.name: Nicholas Allen
models.subject: Love the space!
models.message: We had a great experience. The booking was easy. The staff were super helpful with setting up and finding us props. The 4 hr slot gave us ample time to shoot,  we loved the space itself. Everything went so smoothly. We will definitely be back if we need a studio space again. Thanks Lyn and team!
